TW Posting Bidding Procedures Draft Forwarded by Sharon SolonETSEnron on PM From Sharon Solon PM To Steven HarrisET NRON Drew FossumETSEnron Tony PryorET NRON Kimberly WatsonETSEnron Lorraine LindbergETSEnron Michele nronXgate TK LohmanETSEnron Jeffery nronXGate Lindy DonohoETSEnron Mary DarveauxET NRON Mary Kay MillerET NRON Maria PavlouETSEnron Dari DornanET NRON Steve KirkETSEnron cc Glen HassET NRON Audrey RobertsonETSEnron Emily SellersETSEnron Jan CobdenETSEnron Barbara BischoffET NRON Ann SmithETSEnron Subject TW Posting Bidding Procedures Draft A meeting has been scheduled for Tuesday May th at in the Video Houston C Omaha C to review and finalize the draft prepared by Susan Scott document attached I have faxed a copy of this draft to Kim Watson and her people Also faxed a copy to Steve Harris and Drew Fossum

RE SoCalGas Billing Issue Cc The dialin number will be and the passcode is Omaha participants please meet in Conf Room Thanks Original Message From Pavlou Maria Sent Thursday January PM To Porter J Gregory Harris Steven Miller Mary Kay Kilmer III Robert Lokey Teb Cc Solon Sharon Subject SocalGas Billing Issue I spoke with Greg Healy of SoCalGas today regarding the revised offer Transwestern provided to SoCalGas before Christmas He said they have questions and requested a conference call early next week so that they can better understand our proposal and go forward I have tentatively scheduled the call for Tuesday January from our time Greg indicated that it would be business people and their lawyer Dave Gilmore Sharon pls set up a conference bridge number for us I was going to call Rick Miles to let him know about the status of our discussions He had called me after we sent SoCalGas the revised offer about wanting to know where we were Does anyone have a problem with me calling Rick Maria
Performance ReviewYour scheduled review time with Greg is pm January nd Thanks

REVISED FW Conference Call today Cc We have this conference call regarding Indicated Shippers settlement finalized It will be tomorrow at central time I have allowed hours on the conference bridge The dialin number will be and the passcode is Omaha participants Please meet in Gregs office Original Message From Smith Ann Sent Wednesday October PM To Harris Steven Miller Mary Kay Fossum Drew Pavlou Maria Kirk Steve Frank Kelly Email Steve Stojic Email Kilmer III Robert Call Josie Cc Call Josie Sellers Emily Solon Sharon Subject Conference Call today I can set up a conference bridge for this afternoon at pm Central time if everyone is available Please let Sharon Solon your availability since Im in a training class at pm Thanks Ann Original Message From Porter Gregory J Sent Wednesday October PM To Harris Steven Miller Mary Kay Fossum Drew Pavlou Maria Kirk Steve Frank Kelly Email Steve Stojic Email Kilmer III Robert Cc Smith Ann Subject Indicated Shippers I just received a voice mail from Kathy Edwards attorney for Indicated Shippers She said her clients were not willing to carveout the two issues of competitive bidding and scheduling rights for the Commission to decide as separate policy issues Indicated shippers said both issues have to be a part of a settlement Based on the input I have received from TW thus far Indicated Shippers demands may make a settlement impossible We need to consider whether TW is willing to go further in regard to either or both of the Indicated Shippers positions so far TW has said no Additionally thought should be given to whether appointment of a settlement judge at this time might be helpful I will try to get a call set up to discuss In the mean time any feedback you have would be helpful Greg

RE Conference Call today Cc It looks like it will be tomorrow for this conference call Would each of you be available at central time for hour Please let me know as soon as possible Thanks Original Message From Smith Ann Sent Wednesday October PM To Harris Steven Miller Mary Kay Fossum Drew Pavlou Maria Kirk Steve Frank Kelly Email Steve Stojic Email Kilmer III Robert Call Josie Cc Call Josie Sellers Emily Solon Sharon Subject Conference Call today I can set up a conference bridge for this afternoon at pm Central time if everyone is available Please let Sharon Solon your availability since Im in a training class at pm Thanks Ann Original Message From Porter Gregory J Sent Wednesday October PM To Harris Steven Miller Mary Kay Fossum Drew Pavlou Maria Kirk Steve Frank Kelly Email Steve Stojic Email Kilmer III Robert Cc Smith Ann Subject Indicated Shippers I just received a voice mail from Kathy Edwards attorney for Indicated Shippers She said her clients were not willing to carveout the two issues of competitive bidding and scheduling rights for the Commission to decide as separate policy issues Indicated shippers said both issues have to be a part of a settlement Based on the input I have received from TW thus far Indicated Shippers demands may make a settlement impossible We need to consider whether TW is willing to go further in regard to either or both of the Indicated Shippers positions so far TW has said no Additionally thought should be given to whether appointment of a settlement judge at this time might be helpful I will try to get a call set up to discuss In the mean time any feedback you have would be helpful Greg
